job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Software Engineer
required by a Digital Platform Company working on cutting edge projects such as Next-gen Mobility & Autonomous Automation. Their goal is to help the world’s most ambitious companies build digital platforms and thriving ecosystems.
They are looking for a Software Engineer (Java) to join their team. (Fully remote option with offices in NYC, LA, Detroit, etc.)
The role:
3+years’ experience with Java and Spring
Experience with AWS or GCP
Experience with Devops and CI/CD tools, a plus
Compensation:
Up to $170,000 plus 10% bonus
If this Software Engineer Positon could be of interest please apply through this advert, or send a copy of your Resume to C.Gregoire@x4technology.us
